thread.title: Oil Prices Climb as Sentiment Improves
thread.title_full: Oil Prices Climb as Sentiment Improves - WSJ

author: Georgi Kantchev
title: Oil Prices Climb as Sentiment Improves
text:
LONDON—Oil prices rose Monday on improving sentiment and mounting signs that the decline in U.S. crude production is gathering pace.
On Sunday, Qatar’s energy minister, Mohammed Al Sada, said oil prices have bottomed out and growth in supplies from producers outside the Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries is likely to remain flat or turn negative next year.
A key non-OPEC member, the U.S. has already seen its... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
